Summary: Last night my family and I witness more than 50 ufo`s near our home.
divs: Sighting DetailsLast night around 8:25 my son noticed the objects when he was leaving his grandmas home.My son came inside the house to tell us there was strange objects in the sky.When we went outside and started noticing the objects we thought it was military crafts.There was a lot of objects ascending from the mountain located south from our home.They were different colors,shapes and forms.The first we notice were ascending in groups of 12 at the same time and disappear.Then the other objects started coming in groups of 3 ascending and when they were really high in the sky they would disappear.There was 3 that form into a triangle and then there was a green light connecting them,It seem like they pulled each other together in the sky.All of a sudden we start seeing helicopters flying were the objects were flying and the objects stop from coming and started disapearing. We called the police because we thought it was dangerous and the police took along time to get to our house.When the police arrive to our home there was no more objects in the sky.The police told us that we were the only people that called the police regarding that matter.We felt amazed of what we encounter and cant explain what can it be and what they were doing here.AMAZING!!!!!
trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around April 12th 2013
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
